Summary: Got out of car and noticed the strange and colorful light in the SE sky..
divs: Sighting DetailsA friend and I were just getting back from the movies and when I got out of the car I glanced up at the night sky and noticed right away that there was something in the sky with a very broad range of colors. I ran in to get my binoculars (two pairs). My friend and I (and a passerby) all saw the same thing hovering above the southeastern sky above the Atlantic Ocean. I live not far from the beach so figured it to be over the water. It did not look like another star, nor did it look like a satellite and was not moving at all. We all just stared at it in wonder for a good 15 or 20 minutes until my neck got tired from looking up. I just wanted to report it. My feelings are that it was definitely a UFO. I compared it to stars around it in the sky and it was definitely different and had many colors that seemed to twinkle like christmas tree lights.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Port St Lucie
There were no other sightings in Port St Lucie on or around December 2nd 2007
